00004 #ifndef CONTROL_POINTS_H
00005 #define CONTROL_POINTS_H 1

00007 #include <cassert>
00008 #include <list>
00009 
00010 #include "controls.h"
00011 
00012 class Contour;
00013 
00014 class Control_Points
00015 {
00016 private:
00017   std::vector<int> index;
00018 public:
00019   Control_Points      (void);
00020 private:
00021   void loadMatrix     (std::list<int> & closed_path);
00022   bool checkDeviation (Contour const *,int num_raw_points);
00023 public:
00028   int getNumSplines (void) const
00029   {
00030     int i = static_cast<int>(index.size());
00031     assert(!(i%4));
00032     return i/4;
00033   }
00034 
00039   void initialize (std::list<int> & control_points)
00040   {
00041     int num_points = control_points.size();
00042     // at least enough points for a single spline
00043     assert(num_points>3);
00044     index.clear();
00045     index.reserve(4*num_points);
00046     loadMatrix(control_points);
00047   }
00048 
00054   int getControlPointIndex (int i) const
00055   {
00056 #ifndef NOASSERT
00057     assert(i>=0); 
00058     assert(i<static_cast<int>(index.size())); 
00059 #endif
00060     return index[i];
00061   }
00062 
00067   void print (char * filename) const
00068   {
00069     // assert numbert indeces is multiple of 4
00070     int num_indeces = static_cast<int>(index.size());
00071     assert(!(num_indeces%4));
00072     FILE *F = fopen(filename,"a");
00073     if (!F) { printf("Could not open output file %s\n",filename); return; }
00074     char line[2048];
00075     sprintf(line,"\n# num splines = %i\n",num_indeces/4);
00076     fputs(line,F);
00077     for (int i=0;i<num_indeces;i+=4)
00078     {
00079       assert((i+3)<static_cast<int>(index.size()));
00080       sprintf(line,"%i %i %i %i\n",index[i+0],index[i+1],index[i+2],index[i+3]);
00081       fputs(line,F);
00082     }
00083     fclose(F);
00084   }
00085 };
